DOC.brief_summary: In open label , randomize , two-way cross-over study , 32 male healthy regular snus user give repeat dos four different type portion snus : `` General '' , `` Catch '' , `` Catch Mini '' `` Catch Dry Mini '' . Each portion use snus collect frozen ( -20 oC ) pending analysis lead ( Pb ) , cadmium ( Cd ) , nicotine tobacco specific nitrosamines ( TSNAs ) . Unused snus collect deep frozen analysis calculation extract dose . Calculations extract amount lead , cadmium , nicotine tobacco specific nitrosamines ( TSNAs ) respectively , do type snus .
DOC.brief_title: In-vivo Extraction Pb , Cd TSNA From Swedish Snus
DOC.detailed_description: Comparisons : A= `` General Portion '' 1 g portion snus contain approximately 8 mg nicotine per portion . B= `` Catch Licorice Portion '' 1 g portion snus contain approximately 8 mg nicotine per portion . C= `` Catch Licorice Portion Mini '' 0.5 g portion snus contain approximately 4 mg nicotine per portion . D= `` Catch Dry Licorice Portion Mini '' 0.3 g portion snus contain approximately 4 mg nicotine per portion . Swedish portion snus administer every hour ( 4 administrations/brand ) keep upper lip gum 30 minute . Preload brand morning .
DOC.criteria: nonsmoker , 18 50 year age . Habitual use > 7 portion snus daily since minimum 1 year . Healthy accord health declaration interview . Written informed consent give . Concurrent participation another clinical trial . History allergy . History allergy .
